<a id="BoneAttachment3D"></a>

# BoneAttachment3D

**Inherits:** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Ð node that dynamically copies or overrides the 3D transform of a bone in its parent [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node selects a bone in a [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) and attaches to it. This means that the **BoneAttachment3D** node will either dynamically copy or override the 3D transform of the selected bone.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="BoneAttachment3D_property_bone_idx"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **bone_idx** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#BoneAttachment3D_property_bone_idx)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bone_idx**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_bone_idx**\ (\ )

The index of the attached bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneAttachment3D_property_bone_name"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **bone_name** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#BoneAttachment3D_property_bone_name)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bone_name**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_bone_name**\ (\ )

The name of the attached bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneAttachment3D_property_external_skeleton"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **external_skeleton** [ðŸ”—](#BoneAttachment3D_property_external_skeleton)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_external_skeleton**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_external_skeleton**\ (\ )

The [NodePath](NodePath.md) to the external [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneAttachment3D_property_override_pose"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **override_pose** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#BoneAttachment3D_property_override_pose)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_override_pose**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_override_pose**\ (\ )

Whether the **BoneAttachment3D** node will override the bone pose of the bone it is attached to. When set to ``true``, the **BoneAttachment3D** node can change the pose of the bone. When set to ``false``, the **BoneAttachment3D** will always be set to the bone's transform.

\ **Note:** This override performs interruptively in the skeleton update process using signals due to the old design. It may cause unintended behavior when used at the same time with [SkeletonModifier3D](SkeletonModifier3D.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneAttachment3D_property_use_external_skeleton"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **use_external_skeleton** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#BoneAttachment3D_property_use_external_skeleton)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_external_skeleton**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_use_external_skeleton**\ (\ )

Whether the **BoneAttachment3D** node will use an external [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) node rather than attempting to use its parent node as the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md). When set to ``true``, the **BoneAttachment3D** node will use the external [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) node set in [external_skeleton](BoneAttachment3D.md#BoneAttachment3D_property_external_skeleton).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="BoneAttachment3D_method_get_skeleton"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) **get_skeleton**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#BoneAttachment3D_method_get_skeleton)

Returns the parent or external [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) node if it exists, otherwise returns ``null``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneAttachment3D_method_on_skeleton_update"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **on_skeleton_update**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#BoneAttachment3D_method_on_skeleton_update)

A function that is called automatically when the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) is updated. This function is where the **BoneAttachment3D** node updates its position so it is correctly bound when it is *not* set to override the bone pose.
